# Soulfire (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
This armorâ€™s wearer is immune to all [[Death Spells|death spells]], magical death effects, and energy drain, and any negative energy effects (such as from *[[Chill Touch (Spell)|chill touch]]* or *inflict* spells).

Moderate abjuration; CL 7th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Death Ward (Spell)|death ward]]*; Price +4 bonus.
